group_1.narration: The day after we learned about@the construction project,@Urara―with Miura and Himuro in tow―summoned us@to the catacombs to offer a proposal.

group_1.textLeft: So...Miura will use her magic to summon@the souls of the dead Magical Girls, then.

group_1.textRight: I was thinkin' you could get some closure@this way, see!

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, I getcha.

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, why the long face?
You're gonna get to see your dead friends@again, y'know?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, there's a nine outta ten chance they've@got a grudge against me.
That said, it'll be nice to smooth things over.
Though I'm kinda...worried their ghosts will curse@me to death if we call them out...

group_1.textRight: It'll be fine, see!@I'm sure they'll forgive you!

group_1.textLeft: ...You weren't present for the Bloody Tragedy,@so I cannot fault you for thinking that...
But we have committed more unforgivable acts@than you can possibly imagine.
...Still, at present,
this may be the best way to settle things before@construction starts...

group_1.textRight: Well, we're set to go. Just gotta bite the bullet.

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh yeah, are we gonna get mauled by ghosts?
I know what I've done, so I'm fine with bein'@punished, but I don't want 'em to kill me.
Livin' to change the future is probably the best@way to atone for the past.
It'd be lame as hell if I got clapped and@left behind the stuff I wanna protect.
I've gotta accept their grudges towards me@without dying.
So I wanna come up with some ideas@on dealin' with that.

group_1.textRight: ...Ghosts are essentially unable to land@physical attacks.
Spiritual attacks, on the other hand...@I'm afraid I don't know.

group_1.textLeft: Oi, c'mon...@What kinda vague-ass answer is that...?
I suppose it's for the best that we decided against@bringing Hikaru and everyone else...

group_1.textRight: Well, we were the ones who'd been bossin'@them around anyway, yeah?
The shit that went down in Kamihama, and with Ao...@Nothin' we can do about it here.
Besides, you and me are the ones responsible for@the war in Futatsugi.
...Now, then, would you like me to summon@the deceased?

group_1.textLeft: If you would, please and thank you.
Mm...@By the way, where's that other chick?

group_1.textRight: Sasha is waiting outside.
She's prepared some Grief Seeds in case@anything goes wrong.

group_1.textLeft: "In case anything goes wrong"...@You're wiggin' me out, man...

group_1.textRight: ...It is a fact that a tragedy occurred as the result@of us using our magic before.

group_1.textLeft: Oi... For real?

group_1.textRight: That's why we're going to handle this very carefully.
So...let's begin once we've placed the flowers.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]...Concept Strengthening.

group_1.textRight: *Exhale*...

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]O departed in the netherworld:@I beg you to heed my call.
The Magical Girls of Futatsugi City, whose lives@were lost in battle...
If you can hear my voice, then please,@show yourselves.

group_1.textLeft: Girls...is it really you...?

group_1.textRight: ...Alright, the clock is ticking.@Say a few words while you still can.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102101:cheek_0][chara:102101:lipSynch_1]Right.@First, I must explain...

group_1.textRight: ...I see, so you've made progress, huh?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry, everyone... It's all our fault.
It's unfair that we are the only ones who got to@survive and move forward...
...I ain't expectin' any of ya to forgive me.
I just came to take responsibility while the@catacombs are still here.

group_1.textRight: ...I mean, we're dead, so it's not like we don't@feel any resentment.
But if that's how you feel about it,@you can go ahead however you want.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, as long as our deaths lead to@something better.

group_1.textRight: ...An apology is still in order, isn't it?@Some of these girls were murdered.

group_1.textLeft: One of us even turned into a Witch@because of you, Juri...

group_1.textRight: The body count's high for sure.@I need to get rid of that bad taste in my mouth.

group_1.textLeft: I'm already a goner, but...@I want to save my feelings, if nothing else.

group_1.textRight: That's why we want you to tell us what@all the fighting was about.

group_1.textLeft: Juri and I are to blame for everything@that happened.

group_1.textRight: That's not an explanation.

group_1.textLeft: If you're askin' about the reason behind the war,@it was a fight for survival.

group_1.textRight: Then why did so many of us have to die?

group_1.textLeft: With less Witches around, of course we were@gonna start goin' after each other.
But it's our fault that the conflict escalated@the way it did.

group_1.textRight: Owning up to it won't bring anything back.

group_1.textLeft: ...I know that, dammit!
Juri...
But...considerin' the situation, we couldn't help it!
Even if we stayed on good terms with each other,@we knew what'd happen next...
In the end, we would've run outta Grief Seeds,@and then we ALL would've turned into Witches!

group_1.textRight: ...Are you making excuses?

group_1.textLeft: ...Nn, that ain't it.
I just don't think you guys would be convinced,@even if I explained everythin' to ya now.
Like you said, what's lost is already...

group_1.textRight: So we should let bygones be bygones?@Is that it?

group_1.textLeft: No, I wanna atone for...

group_1.textRight: ...I can't believe you.

group_1.textLeft: There's no way I can let this slide.

group_1.textCenter: Kamihama was one of the culprits, but even our@local leadership had issues.

group_1.textRight: There HAD to have been another way.
If you'd done things differently, maybe some of@these girls wouldn't have had to die!

group_1.narration: "I CAN'T FORGIVE YOU!"@"I CAN'T FORGIVE YOU!"@"I CAN'T FORGIVE YOU!"

group_1.textLeft: Oh...oh boy...

group_1.textCenter: Asahi, hurry up and release your magic...@I've already dropped my Concept Strengthening.

group_1.textRight: Something isn't right...!@My power is going out of control...!
Ngh... This is bad...@I can't...stay conscious...

group_1.textLeft: What...in the world...

group_1.textRight: Ugh...

group_1.narration: "You will learn how we truly feel."

group_1.textCenter: [se:7201_detect_magic][chara:103500:effect_ef_adv_01]*Gasp*?![wait:0.8][chara:103500:cheek_0][chara:103500:lipSynch_1] That can't be good...@Asahi and Rabi's magic is...

group_1.textRight: Why...? Her Soul Gem is gaining impurities@at an alarming rate...!

group_1.textCenter: Everyone else, too... They're all unconscious...
